General.Name: Tectonic Metals Inc
General.Description: Tectonic Metals Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. It primarily explores for gold deposits. The company holds 100% interests in the Tibbs project located in Fairbanks Recording District, Alaska; Flat project situated in the Kuskokwim Mineral Belt, Alaska; and Carrie Creek and Mt. Harper properties located in the Goodpaster District, Alaska. Tectonic Metals Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 312-744 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1A5
